summary.para: The TRIVERTEX structure contains color information and position information.

remarks.para: In the TRIVERTEX structure, x and y indicate position in the same manner as in the POINTL structure contained in the wtypes.h header file. Red, Green, Blue, and Alpha members indicate color information at the point x, y. The color information of each channel is specified as a value from 0x0000 to 0xff00. This allows higher color resolution for an object that has been split into small triangles for display. The TRIVERTEX structure contains information needed by the pVertex parameter of .
For an example of the use of this structure, see Drawing a Shaded Triangle or Drawing a Shaded Rectangle.
